name: Anacacia Capital
tag_list: australia, small-medium-enterprise, sme, language, appliances, food, audio, science, venture, private
overview:
Anacacia Capital has built a reputation as Australiaâ€™s most active private equity firm that focuses on small-medium enterprises (SMEs).

Anacacia has closed over 10 Australian transactions in the last 3 years with established companies that are managing ownership change, succession and new acquisitions. The firm has a mix of experienced strategic, operational and finance personnel that provide strategic insight and capital to outstanding management teams to help their portfolio grow.

The firm is led by Jeremy Samuel who is one of Australia’s most experienced investors in small-medium enterprises and includes some of Australia’s most respected business people that take an active role on the board of the portfolio companies.

Anacacia successfully helped grow and sell Lomb Scientific in December 2010. Other portfolio companies include Appen Butler Hill, Hone Appliances, Norwest Productions and Rafferty’s Garden.

See www.anacacia.com.au
